references.paper_title: Physics-informed neural networks: A deep learning framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) framework, which is central to the methodology of Med-Real2Sim.

references.paper_title: A dynamical state space representation and performance analysis of a feedback-controlled rotary left ventricular assist device
references.reason: This paper provides the lumped-parameter model of cardiovascular hemodynamics that serves as the core physics-based model in Med-Real2Sim's digital twin framework.

references.paper_title: Video-based AI for beat-to-beat assessment of cardiac function
references.reason: This paper provides the EchoNet dataset, which is one of the two main datasets used for training and evaluating Med-Real2Sim, offering valuable non-invasive cardiac data.

references.paper_title: Deep Learning for Segmentation Using an Open Large-Scale Dataset in 2D Echocardiography
references.reason: This paper introduces the CAMUS dataset, the second major dataset utilized in Med-Real2Sim, providing additional non-invasive cardiac ultrasound data.

references.paper_title: Use of a conductance (volume) catheter and transient inferior vena caval occlusion for rapid determination of pressure-volume relationships in man
references.reason: This paper details the pressure-volume relationship, which is an important clinical measurement that Med-Real2Sim aims to predict using non-invasive methods.
